comment: Actually the R word... refers to the Missing FMR1 protein in the gene ( Fragile Mental Retardation) causing FRAGILE X Syndrome which is an intellectual disability. All people with Autism should get tested for Fragile X Syndrome as it is a genetic cause most dont know about.
